title: Add Store & Vote sections, wire config + navigation, and swap in uploaded logo/hero background

requirements.summary: Add a new Store section and include it in the site navigation with smooth scrolling.
acceptanceCriteria: A new section exists with id="store" and a visible heading "Store".
SiteNav includes a "Store" link that smooth-scrolls to the Store section on desktop and mobile.
App renders the Store section in a sensible position among existing sections (e.g., after Features and before How to Join, or near Contact).
The Store section contains clear placeholder content indicating where a store link/button will go (no broken links).

file_operations.description: Create a new StoreSection component rendering a section with id="store" and heading "Store"; show placeholder content and a store call-to-action that is disabled/marked "Coming soon" when configured URL is a placeholder/missing, reading display text/URL from siteConfig.
Import and render StoreSection in a sensible order among existing sections (e.g., after FeaturesSection and before HowToJoinSection) so it appears in the main scroll flow.
Add a "Store" item to the navLinks list so both desktop and mobile menus smooth-scroll to the section id "store" via the existing scrollToSection helper.
Replace/update the existing generated logo asset with the uploaded image at the same path so SiteNav/Footer/Hero reflect the new logo without code changes.
Replace/update the existing generated hero background image with the derived uploaded image at the same path so the hero background reflects the new branding.

requirements.summary: Add a new Vote section and include it in the site navigation with smooth scrolling.
acceptanceCriteria: A new section exists with id="vote" and a visible heading "Vote".
SiteNav includes a "Vote" link that smooth-scrolls to the Vote section on desktop and mobile.
App renders the Vote section in a sensible position among existing sections (e.g., near Store).
The Vote section contains clear placeholder content indicating where vote site links/buttons will go (no broken links).

file_operations.description: Create a new VoteSection component rendering a section with id="vote" and heading "Vote"; show a list of vote links/buttons driven by siteConfig, and render clear placeholder/disabled UI when URLs are placeholders/missing.
Import and render VoteSection near StoreSection (e.g., directly after StoreSection) to keep related sections adjacent in the page flow.
Add a "Vote" item to the navLinks list so both desktop and mobile menus smooth-scroll to the section id "vote" via the existing scrollToSection helper.

requirements.summary: Extend frontend siteConfig with Store/Vote placeholder values and wire new sections to read from it.
acceptanceCriteria: siteConfig includes new fields for Store and Vote (e.g., storeUrl and voteUrls or similar) with safe placeholder values if the user has not provided real links.
Store and Vote sections read any URLs/text they display from siteConfig (not hardcoded).
If placeholder URLs are used, UI clearly indicates they are placeholders (e.g., disabled button or "Coming soon").

file_operations.description: Extend siteConfig with Store and Vote configuration fields (e.g., storeUrl/storeCtaLabel and voteLinks array) using safe placeholder values (such as empty strings) suitable for rendering "Coming soon"/disabled UI.
Wire StoreSection to read all displayed text/URLs from siteConfig and to treat placeholder values as non-actionable (disabled button/no outgoing navigation).
Wire VoteSection to read vote link labels/URLs from siteConfig and to treat placeholder values as non-actionable (disabled buttons/no outgoing navigation).

requirements.summary: Update footer Quick Links to include smooth-scroll links to Store and Vote sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer shows "Store" and "Vote" alongside existing quick links.
Clicking footer links smooth-scrolls to the corresponding section.

file_operations.description: Add "Store" and "Vote" buttons to the Quick Links list, using the existing smooth-scroll pattern (scrollIntoView with behavior: 'smooth') to targets "store" and "vote".
